GPpracticeRecordEntry.GPpracticeDetails: U Health Centre, 12 High Road, AG1 2RD

AboutMe.AboutMe: I am 78 and I live with my husband. I enjoy looking after my grandchildren. I would like to do more with them but get pains from arthritis. I also have diabetes and COPD

AboutMe.SupportedToWriteThisBy: Myself (Ms Jane Doe), Dr Joe Collins (GP) joe.Collins9@nhs.net

NeedsConcernsOrProblems.GoalsAndHopes: To fit into size 16 dress by Christmas. Importance: 10/10

ActionsAndActivities.What: Increase walking. Cut out daily biscuits with morning and afternoon coffee. Change sugar to sweeteners in hot drinks

NeedsConcernsOrProblems.GoalsAndHopes: To walk to the park with my grandchildren. Importance: 10/10

ActionsAndActivities.What: Gradually increase walking distance, see physiotherapist

ActionsAndActivities.StageGoal: To walk to the end of the garden
ActionsAndActivities.What: To do home exercise programme as given by the physiotherapist. 10 repeats of each exercise x2 daily
ActionsAndActivities.SuggestedStrategies: Slowly increase walking distance each week

ActionsAndActivities.StageGoal: To walk to the end of the street
ActionsAndActivities.What: Continue home exercise program. 15 repeats of each exercise x3 daily

ContingencyPlans.WhatShouldHappen: Follow advice on COPD action plan. Start rescue pack if indicated
ContingencyPlans.WhoShouldBeContacted: Urgent Care Team 01915555555, or Glenpark Surgery on 019122222222
